Question: Which FConcurrency*?
Constraint/Rule: if (FConcurrency*.featureCheckLeaks) {FStatisticsFeatures* = featureStatisticsLock;}if (FConcurrency*.featureLatch) {FConcurrency* = dummyFeatureLocking;FConcurrency* = featureCheckLeaks;FDbOperation* = featureDeleteDb;FEvictor = true;FPersistencyFeatures* = featureFileHandleCache;FConcurrency* = featureFSync;featureINCompressor = true;featureMemoryBudget = true;FStatisticsFeatures* = featureStatisticsLock;featureTreeVisitor = true;FDbOperation* = featureTruncateDb;featureVerifier = true;}if (FConcurrency*.featureTransaction) {FConcurrency* = dummyFeatureLocking;FDbOperation* = featureDeleteDb;FDbOperation* = featureTruncateDb;}

Question: Which FDbOperation*?
Constraint/Rule: if (FDbOperation*.featureDeleteDb) {FConcurrency* = dummyFeatureLocking;FEvictor = true;featureINCompressor = true;featureMemoryBudget = true;}if (FDbOperation*.featureTruncateDb) {FDbOperation* = featureDeleteDb;}

Question: Which FPersistencyFeatures*?
Range: Checkpointer | Cleaner | featureChecksum | featureEnvironmentLock | featureFileHandleCache | featureHandleFullDiscError

Question: Which FStatisticsFeatures*?
Range: EnvStats | featureStatisticsDatabase | featureStatisticsLock | featureStatisticsPreload | featureStatisticsSequence | featureStatisticsTransaction
